side-dash.name: Side Dash
side-dash.result: This mecha is pushed 3" in any direction.

slam.name: Chasis Slam
slam.result: _Enemy only_.The target takes *a hit* and is pushed this mecha's **speed** away.

stabilizers.name: Stabilizers
stabilizers.result: This mecha gains the **immobilized** condition. Until the end of the activation, this model receives **+1** value to all its action flips.

vent-steam.name: Vent Steam
vent-steam.result: his mecha discards **3 overheat cards** and gains **obscured** until the end of the round.

aa-barrage.name: AA Barrage
aa-barrage.result: Until the end of the round, if an enemy mecha is **placed** within 6", it suffers **1 damage**.

gatling.name: Gatling
gatling.result: The target takes **a hit**. After resolving, **overcharge** this mecha to take this action again.

repulse.name: Repulse
repulse.result: _Target any obscuring or blocking terrain point or mecha._ This mecha is **pushed** 6" away from the target point. If the target was an obstacle or a mecha, then **push** the target 6" away from this mecha. If any push generated by this action is stopped, both pushing element and stopping element **take a hit**.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.result: This mecha draws a card (discard and replace any jokers) and adds it to its **overheat pile**.

cold-exhaust.name: Cold Exhaust
cold-exhaust.desc: Discard one extra overheat card on reactor cooldown.

inertia-dischargers.name: Inertia Dischargers
inertia-dischargers.desc: When resolving an assault action (and its free action), this mecha receives **+1 value** to all action flips.

hover.name: Hover
hover.desc: This mecha ignore terrain effects while moving and can move across (but not stop on top of) other mechas and terrain. If this model where to receive the **immobilized** condition, it will suffer **1 damage** on this system instead.

power-surge.name: Power Surge
power-surge.desc: When an action of this system causes at least one point of damage to an enemy mecha, this mecha may **draw a card**.

rekindle.name: Rekindle
rekindle.desc: When an action of this system causes an already burning target to gain burning again, immediately **resolve the burning condition effect**, reflipping â™¥.
